Package accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.controller

Class BankLoanController

java.lang.Object
accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.controller.BankLoanController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/loan") public class BankLoanController extends Object
This class is responsible for handling bank loan related requests. It provides endpoints for getting all loans, filtering loans, getting a loan by id or reference number, opening a loan, repaying a loan, updating a loan date, and deleting a loan.

  • Method Details

    • getAllLoans

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<BankLoan>> getAllLoans()
      This method is used to get all loans.
      Returns:
      A list of all bank loans.

    • filterLoans

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/filter") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<BankLoan>> filterLoans(@RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(value="size",defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(value="sort",defaultValue="asc") String sort)
      This method is used to filter loans.
      Parameters:
      page - The page number.
      size - The size of the page.
      sort - The sort order.
      Returns:
      A page of filtered bank loans.

    • getLoanById

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BankLoan> getLoanById(@PathVariable("id") Long loanId)
      This method is used to get a loan by id.
      Parameters:
      loanId - The id of the loan.
      Returns:
      The bank loan with the given id.

    • getLoanByReferenceNumber

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/reference") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BankLoan> getLoanByReferenceNumber(@RequestBody BankLoanRequest request)
      This method is used to get a loan by reference number.
      Parameters:
      request - The request containing the reference number.
      Returns:
      The bank loan with the given reference number.

    • openLoan

      @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PostMapping(path="/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BankLoan> openLoan(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestParam("option") String option, @RequestBody BankLoanRequest loanRequest)
      This method is used to open a loan.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the user or card.
      option - The option to specify whether the id is for a user or a card.
      loanRequest - The request containing the loan amount and currency type.
      Returns:
      The opened bank loan.

    • loanRepayment

      @ResponseStatus(ACCEPTED) @PatchMapping(path="/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public void loanRepayment(@PathVariable("id") Long loanId, @RequestBody BankLoanRequest loanRequest)
      This method is used to repay a loan.
      Parameters:
      loanId - The id of the loan.
      loanRequest - The request containing the loan amount and currency type.

    • updateLoanDate

      @ResponseStatus(ACCEPTED) @PatchMapping(path="/{id}/date") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\')") public void updateLoanDate(@PathVariable("id") Long loanId, @RequestBody BankLoanRequest request)
      This method is used to update a loan date.
      Parameters:
      loanId - The id of the loan.
      request - The request containing the start date and expiration date.

    • deleteLoan

      @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public void deleteLoan(@RequestParam String sort, @PathVariable("id") Long loanId)
      This method is used to delete a loan.
      Parameters:
      sort - The sort option to specify whether the id is for a user or a card.
      loanId - The id of the loan.
